attributes.action: The British public hold MPs in contempt and find them unfit for purpose.
attributes.background: MPs on both sides of the house have failed to carry out the will of the people, over leaving the EU. A majority of MPs voted to give a referendum and to honour the result. The public on both sides of the argument have had enough of these over paid self serving bottom dwellers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like to happen. 

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead: 

Hold a Public Vote of No Confidence in the Administration of the United Kingdom 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237424

Have another general election https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449
